products.name: Design Dante Bar
products.description: Architonic ID: 20276763Year of Launch: 2020Offered in two versions as a chair and bar stool, the Dante series stands out with its sculptural silhouette and refined use of wood. Its softly twisted frame and precise linear forms give it a strong character, while the rich texture of wood enhances its presence in any space.Dante comes in three variations: fully wooden, with upholstered seat, or with upholstered seat and back. It meets a range of functional and aesthetic needs. With its generous proportions and subtly curved backrest, the design balances comfort and style, making it a versatile choice for restaurants, bars and shared spaces.The wood finish can be selected from B&T Design’s wide range of color options. Upholstery can be customized with any fabric or leather from the collection. products.name: Design Loft
products.description: Architonic ID: 20276855Year of Launch: 2015The Loft seating system comes in many configurations and dimensions, offering a concept of functionality and flexibility with well-manufactured details. Loft, designed for waiting areas and break rooms, is shaped by both architectural and user-oriented needs.Its compact size allows it to fit smaller waiting areas such as corridors, and it can also be configured as an island module. Different modules such as coffee tables with various material options, arms, and separations add even more functionality.With Loft modules, you can create design scenarios for a variety of spaces, forming flexible layouts and reflecting the spirit of spatial harmony with rich color options. With its generous proportions and subtly curved backrest, the design balances comfort and style, making it a versatile choice for restaurants, bars and shared spaces.The wood finish can be selected from B&T Design’s wide range of color options. Upholstery can be customized with any fabric or leather from the collection. A concealed metal frame beneath the surface adds extra durability to the solid wood structure, ensuring long-lasting use and stability without compromising on elegance.Read more Architonic ID: 2027676

products.description: Architonic ID: 20309150Year of Launch: 2023Welcome to the new chapter in our beloved Stripes sofa family: the refined and cosy Stripes Soft. After years of triumph and satisfaction with the Stripes collection, we decided to embark on a journey of renewal, making slight changes to the shape and structure to offer an even more enveloping experience.At the heart of this evolution lies the desire to lighten and soften the geometries of the original product, creating a more welcoming and comfortable environment. One of the most significant innovations is the decision to extend the quilting outwards, together with an increase in the size of the horizontal quilting of the panels. This contributes to the Stripes Soft sofa's fresh texture and pleasant tactile feel, enhancing the overall sensory experience.The seat has been completely reinvented to ensure greater comfort, with softer cushions for optimum comfort.
